message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is truly significant.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Could we possibly meet closer to my budget at $15,000?
